str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
